page.title: 07WHY WE LIVE HERE
page.content: Of 489 responses to the question "Why do you live in this area?",over half said they came here to take up employment.13.5% said they were born here.15.3% said Newton Hall was an attractive environment.5% said the relatively cheap housing was a key factor.5% said they came here after marriage to a local resident.2% came to be near relatives.3% came for education opportunties.3% came for centrality and access to amenities.People were asked about the likelihood of moving.Out of 305 responses-61% felt a move was unlikely,15.3% felt they would never move,12% moved every 4/5 years,10% felt they would probably move in the next 5 years,0.9% were moving in the near future.
